content: get this chunky crochet blanket pattern to make a cozy beautiful blanket with window row placed for a cool visual texture this blanket is crocheted with easy row repeats making for a super fast project this is a beginner-friendly crochet blanket with a video tutorial on how to get started with a foundation half_double_crochet stitch use the free pattern get an all in one kit - yarn + pdf 1 written in american standard terms materials 8 00 mm crochet hook 5 7 10 skeins of hue + me sample made in arrowwood 617-132aa #5 bulky weight yarn 685 959 1370 yards skill level easy sizing baby lapghan throw - 33x38 41x45 50x53 inches 1 https //www lionbrand com/collections/all-knit-crochet-kits/products/crochet-kit-peek-a-boo-blanket variant=40940752437341&sscid=31k7_6hzv7
